body_html:
I ran into this after building tensorflow from source. Looks to me like you do not get tensorboard automatically when you build tensorflow yourself.

It worked for me after I built tensorboard separately from source: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard.
body_text:
I ran into this after building tensorflow from source. Looks to me like you do not get tensorboard automatically when you build tensorflow yourself.
It worked for me after I built tensorboard separately from source: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard.
body:
I ran into this after building tensorflow from source. Looks to me like you do not get tensorboard automatically when you build tensorflow yourself.

It worked for me after I built tensorboard separately from source: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard.
